sentences.en: Anyway, we shall do better to bide where we are, and let the soldiers rally us.
sentences.cn: 不管怎样, 我们最好在这儿等一下, 等那些士兵跟我们集结在一起.

sentences.en: Bide still until you feel better.
sentences.cn: 安静一会儿直到你觉得好一些.

sentences.en: Bide within the Law you must, in perfect Love and perfect Trust.
sentences.cn: 你必须遵照法则, 有全然的爱和理想的信念.

sentences.en: He was content to bide his time patiently, waiting for the opportunity to approach her.
sentences.cn: 他乐于耐心等待接近她的良机。

sentences.en: Humans know how to wait, to bide their time until the story is complete.
sentences.cn: 人类知道如何等待时机, 耐住性子,直到事件结束.

sentences.en: I bide my time and continue scouring the old texts for answers.
sentences.cn: 我一边从教派遗留的古籍中寻求答案一边默默等待.

sentences.en: I bide my time and the hour of vengeance is nigh.
sentences.cn: 我在等待时机,报仇的时刻就要到了.

sentences.en: If we bide our time, I'm sure the reporters will call the politicians'bluff.
sentences.cn: 如果我们等待时机成熟, 我确信记者就会揭穿那些政治家的谎言.

sentences.en: Otherwise we should rather fall back and carefully bide our time.
sentences.cn: 否则宁可退让,持重待机.

sentences.en: Otherwise we would rather fall back and bide our time.
sentences.cn: 否则宁可退让,等待时机.

sentences.en: she patiently bided her time before making an escape bid.
sentences.cn: 她耐心地等待时机，然后才试图逃脱。

sentences.en: They are stronger than us and can afford to bide their time.
sentences.cn: 他们比我们有实力，可以耐心等待时机。

sentences.en: Tis you, tis you must go and I must bide.
sentences.cn: 是你你必需离去而我等待你的归来.

sentences.en: We'll have to bide our time until the rain stops.
You'bide your time'for a good opportunity to make a move.
sentences.cn: 当你瞅准时机下手时,我们说你是‘在等待时机 ’.

words.tran_cn: 停留；继续；遭到（bide的过去式）

phrases.tran_cn: 等待时机，耐心等待：等待更进一步的发展

trans.tran_en: to wait until the right moment to do something

trans.tran_cn: 等待，面临，禁得起，等待时机
